description:
When the need for a house gimp came up, I looked to Miss Delilah Strong to train one. She is a very tough and experienced player, and she recently starting domming for the company.
In her first MIP shoot she shows amazing drive and initiative in drilling our measly worm boy to his knees where he belongs.
Once he is taken down a peg, she teaches him the proper way to fuck and suck a woman through strict and painful lessons that he will not soon forget.
title: The Trainer
